subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer held off Andy Roddick and won the longest fifth set ever in a Grand Slam final, 16-14. With his 15th major singles title, he broke Pete Sampras’s mark.
snippet: Roger Federer held off Andy Roddick and won the longest fifth set ever in a Grand Slam final, 16-14. With his 15th major singles title, he broke Pete Sampras’s mark.
